entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melfort
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:35 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melfort 12:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -21.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -29
Dewpoint: -24.5°C
Wind: WNW 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill near minus 43. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 34 in the evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Tuesday 31 January 2023
